overview:
Mobile & proximity marketing expertise, CEO at Cuponeo.com

Female enterpreneur, born and raised in Barcelona. Mrs. TrullÃ s has got a multicultural background after living in main world capitals such as Madrid, London and New York.

At the age of 25, Maria launches www.cuponeo.com. Seven months later, Cuponeo is one of the leading companies in Spain related to web & mobile coupons.

Her professional interests, experience and knowledge is basicly related to Marketing. Before starting her own company, Maria worked for Agfa HealthCare (privately held company) and the Trade Commission of Spain in New York (public held organization).

Nowadays, Maria is full-time dedicated to Cuponeo, which is ready to expand internationally.
